author: Author
copy_success_1: The image link has been automatically copied to the system clipboard

img_name.title: Image Name Settings
img_name.hash_switch_desc: Automatically add a hash code to the image name before uploading to ensure uniqueness. It is strongly recommended to turn on this feature.
img_name.prefix_switch_desc: Automatically add a prefix to the image name before uploading. For example: abc-image.jpg, where abc- is the prefix.

img_watermark.title: Image Watermark Settings
img_watermark.switch_desc: After turning on this feature, you can customize the watermark text, font size, position, color, and transparency.
img_watermark.text_input_placeholder: Please enter the watermark text, limited to 20 characters.

img_compress.title: Image Compression Settings
img_compress.switch_desc: After enable, the image will be auto compressed before uploading, which can effectively shorten the image upload and loading time. It is strongly recommended enable.
img_compress.radio_1_desc: The compressed image format is webp, which has a higher compression ratio and is supported by most browsers.
img_compress.radio_2_desc: The compressed image format is jpg, which has the best compatibility and is supported by all browsers.
img_compress.radio_3_desc: The compressed image format is avif, which has an extremely high compression ratio and is supported by some modern browsers.

link_rule.title: Image Link Rules Configuration
link_rule.input_name_1_rule: The Image Link Type Name cannot be empty.
link_rule.input_name_2_rule: The Image Link Rule cannot be empty.
link_rule.error_msg_1: Failed to add, the image link rule already exists
link_rule.error_msg_2: {action} failed, image link rule must contain {path}
link_rule.error_msg_3: The image link rule is missing {rules}. Do you want to confirm {action}?

link_format.title: Image Link Format Settings
link_format.switch_desc: After a successful upload, the copied image link will be automatically converted to the {type} format.
link_format.delete_tips: This operation will permanently delete the image link rule

image_hosting_deploy.title: Image hosting deployment
image_hosting_deploy.fail2: Deployment failed, please try again later
image_hosting_deploy.deploying: Deploying to GitHub Pages, this process will take about 1 minute, please wait patiently...

cloud_settings.tip_1: It is detected that your settings data is not saved to the cloud repository. Do you want to save it?
cloud_settings.tip_2: It is detected that your cloud repository has a configuration file. Do you want to use it?
cloud_settings.tip_3: It is detected that your settings data has changed. Do you want to synchronize it to the cloud repository?
cloud_settings.tip_4: The local settings data is consistent with the cloud repository settings data

config.manualConfiguration3: Configure using an existing GitHub repository step by step
config.placeholder3: Please enter the name of new branch ...
config.placeholder4: Please enter the newly created directory ...
config.message2: Failed to retrieve user information, please verify that the token is correct
config.message3: Failed to automatically create GitHub repository, please try again later
config.message5: One-click automated configuration failed, please try again.
config.message8: Please select a directory in the {repo} repository
config.message9: Failed to retrieve repository information, please try again later
config.message11: Failed to retrieve user information, please verify that the GitHub Token is valid
config.rootDir2: Images are stored in the root directory of {branch} branch
config.autoDir2: Automatically create a directory with format yyyyMMdd
config.repoDir2: Choose a directory in the {branch} branch

upload.uploadAreaTips: Drag / Paste / Click here to select images
upload.message1: Please complete the image hosting configuration first
upload.message4: Please select an image to upload
upload.message7: Upload failed, please try again later

management.reload: Reload all data in the {dir} directory
management.toNextDir: Double-click to enter the next level directory
management.delTips: This operation will permanently delete the image
management.delTips2: Are you sure you want to delete the selected {total} images in bulk?
management.message7: Deletion failed, please try again later
management.contextmenu_1: Upload new image from current location

toolbox.tool_1_desc: Offline ultimate compression without size or quantity limit, and without uploading to server
toolbox.tool_2_desc: Online conversion of images to Base64 encoding without size or quantity limit
toolbox.tool_3_desc: Customize watermark text, font size, position, color and opacity

feedback.text_1: PicX is a GitHub API based image hosting tool, providing image upload and hosting, generating image links, and a set of commonly used image tools.
feedback.text_2: We suggest adding our website to your browser bookmarks for easy future access.
feedback.text_3: If PicX is helpful to you, please consider donating to the author to support open source development.
feedback.text_4: Disclaimer: Do not upload images that violate the laws in your local jurisdiction. The author is not responsible for any consequences arising from such actions.

toggle_language_msg: We detected that your IP is located in {region}. Do you want to switch to {language}?

authorization.msg_1: GitHub OAuth authorization login has expired, please re-authorize
authorization.msg_2: PicX APP is not installed on GitHub and has no operation permission yet
authorization.msg_3: PicX GitHub APP is installed successfully. Do you want to authorize the login?
authorization.text_2: Fill in GitHub Token to log in
authorization.text_4: GitHub Token has expired, please authorize your login again
authorization.text_8: PicX GitHub APP must be installed to log in using GitHub OAuth authorization
authorization.text_9: Filling in the GitHub Token to log in must generate a Token with operation permissions
